products.name: MacBook Pro 16
products.description: The MacBook Pro 16 is a high-performance laptop with a stunning Retina display, powerful M1 Pro chip, and long battery life, perfect for professionals.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.description: Dell XPS 13 is a sleek and compact laptop featuring a 13.4-inch display, Intel Core i7 processor, and a slim, portable design ideal for on-the-go productivity.

products.name: iPhone 14
products.description: iPhone 14 offers advanced features like a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, 5G connectivity, and an improved dual-camera system.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S23
products.description: Samsung Galaxy S23 features a 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and a triple-camera setup for stunning photos and videos.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4
products.description: Sony WH-1000XM4 are industry-leading noise-canceling headphones with exceptional sound quality, 30-hour battery life, and touch sensor controls.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 45
products.description: Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones provide world-class noise cancellation, excellent comfort, and up to 24 hours of battery life for long listening sessions.
